Developer Terms of Use
des: Konkani guide is a one stop skill to learn everything about konkani people, culture, religion, food, attire, ceremonies. You can ask specific question related to knokani language. Ask konkani guide, what food konkani eat? Where do konkani people live?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
